issue.title: Is it correct, that we have to upload about 3GB for each Robot?

content.raw: Not exactly.  Based upon what you start building your image from it can be significantly less and then each robot can technically be the same image \(if you can utilize environmental variables\) or separate images that differ only by a layer or two \(which can be much smaller\).
content.html: Not exactly. Based upon what you start building your image from it can be significantly less and then each robot can technically be the same image (if you can utilize environmental variables) or separate images that differ only by a layer or two (which can be much smaller).
